pages.text: $(item)Orichalcum$() is a highly alchemically charged alloy of $(item)Gold$() and $(l:intro/cinnabar)Cinnabar$().$(br2)This metal, while too soft for standard tools or armor, excels when used for mechanisms. As a practician of $(thing)Engineering$(), you'll find yourself making more than your handful of $(l:engineering/orichalcum_gear)cogwheels$() out of it.
